name: Mija - a pill that mostly works [v3]

metadata.description:
this song is about my experience with fame and addiction.  addiction to pills, addiction to pain, addiction to dopamine hits

and the chase

lyrics.text:
its the pain 
the gain
the quick money that takes everything away and drives you insane

take a risk 
a chance
you know that this was never meant to last it's all on you

can't help that i want it all
i drop down til i hit the floor and
reach up for a pill that mostly works 

it's the wheel and deal
the agency that drives your sex appeal and makes you a star
whats the shame
who's to blame
when everything collapses it comes down in your arms

can't help that i want it all
i drop down til i hit the floor and
reach up for a pill that mostly works 

i'm tired of racing
chasing a dream thats fading
leanin on pills that mostly work
feels like a deep ocean
cant stop whats put in motion
i like a crutch but thats a perc

can't help that i want it all
i drop down til i hit the floor and
reach up for a pill that mostly works

metadata.name: a pill that mostly works [v3] #1
metadata.title: a pill that mostly works [v3]
